name: Rapefruit
description: A desert fruit. Caution: Those who imbibe it turn into ravanous slaves to their own lust. Dangerous in the wrong hands.

name: Mag Cuffs
description: Heavy electromagnetic wrist shackles that are said to be inescapable.

name: VHS tape
description: An ancient plastic tome of unknowable analog mysteries.

name: Condom
description: A sheath-shaped device designed to reduce the risk of sexually transmitted disease, pregnancy, and fun.

name: Bio-Spray
description: A Ultrasporin-brand aerosol healing spraycan. They stopped making this stuff a long time ago.
